Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Sebastian Gatscha. Author, maintainer.

  • Bhaskar Karambelkar. Author.

  • Barret Schloerke. Author.

  • Bangyou Zheng. Contributor.
    Leaflet-search and Leaflet-GPS plugin integration

  • Robin Cura. Contributor.
    Fixes for Draw Options

  • Markus Voge. Contributor.
    Enhancements for Draw Options

  • Markus Dumke. Contributor.
    Bounce Marker addition

  • Mapbox. Contributor, copyright holder.
    leaflet-omnivore, csv2geojson, and togeojson libraries

  • Henry Thasler. Contributor, copyright holder.
    Leaflet.Geodesic library

  • Dennis Wilhelm. Contributor, copyright holder.
    Leaflet.StyleEditor library

  • Kirollos Risk. Contributor, copyright holder.
    fuse.js library

  • Tim Wisniewski. Contributor, copyright holder.
    leaflet-choropleth library

  • Leaflet. Contributor, copyright holder.
    leaflet-draw library

    leaflet-draw-drag library

    leaflet-fullscreen library

    leaflet-gps library

    leaflet-hash library
